message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to offer it to you at $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $16,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
